item.title: Building a Real-Time Stock Market Data Pipeline with Apache Kafka and Cassandra
item.description: Building a Real-Time Stock Market Data Pipeline with Apache Kafka and Cassandra In today’s fast-paced financial markets, the ability to process and analyze real-time data is crucial. I recently embarked on a project to build a real-time stock market data pipeline using Apache Kafka and Cassandra. This project not only enhanced my understanding of distributed systems but also provided valuable insights into handling high-volume, time-sensitive data.
